title: How to Make Mushroom Cabbage Fried Rice

steps.headline: Prepare the rice by cooking it in a rice cooker.
Heat about 1 to 2 tablespoons of oil into a wok.
Add the dried shrimps, lean pork, mushrooms, and soy sauce to the wok.
steps.description: Stir fry the mixture for about 2 to 3 minutes.

steps.headline: Add the cabbage to the wok and cook for another 2 to 3 minutes.
steps.description: Simmer until all ingredients are cooked.

steps.headline: Add the rice to the mixture in two ways:
steps.description:

text:
Prepare the rice by cooking it in a rice cooker. Heat about 1 to 2 tablespoons of oil into a wok. Add the dried shrimps, lean pork, mushrooms, and soy sauce to the wok. Stir fry the mixture for about 2 to 3 minutes. Add the cabbage to the wok and cook for another 2 to 3 minutes. Simmer until all ingredients are cooked. Add the rice to the mixture in two ways: Transfer the mixture to the rice cooker once the rice is cooked. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/ad\/Make-Mushroom-Cabbage-Fried-Rice-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Mushroom-Cabbage-Fried-Rice-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/ad\/Make-Mushroom-Cabbage-Fried-Rice-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Mushroom-Cabbage-Fried-Rice-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Carefully add the rice to the wok, breaking it up and stirring it thoroughly with the other ingredients until completely mixed in. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/8d\/Make-Mushroom-Cabbage-Fried-Rice-Step-5Bullet2.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Mushroom-Cabbage-Fried-Rice-Step-5Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/8d\/Make-Mushroom-Cabbage-Fried-Rice-Step-5Bullet2.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Mushroom-Cabbage-Fried-Rice-Step-5Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"
